resources.string: This application need notification permission to handle works! please allow it to enjoy!
Add application and watch for important messages
Out of range, Should be between 1 to 10!
Do you want to delete this app?
Start time needs to be less than end time, and between one day!
A star-up software development team, with 100% dedicated peoples! With a long vison.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Not Working When App In Background?
Selected music can\'t be less than 30 seconds!
Click on the rounded + button, for adding application. Message from this applications, will play alarm!
Filter by messaging, and choose application from the list. Choose preferences from the next screen and save application!
Set custom time, set custom sender names, Only messages from this names will play alarm. Also you can filter alarm by message body!

This sticky notification indicates that the application is alive and waiting for message, Click on the notification button to mute and un-mute application, The power button turn off the sticky notification and kills the service

This is at setting page, set automatic mute time, application will be un-mute after that time. If your phone killing this application when app is in background. Click on that bottom button and follow the instruction
Do you wants to clear message body?
Do you wants to clear sender names?
Do you wants to clear ignored names?
Hint: Please add complete name with space!
Sorry your device doesn\'t support this app!

Sorry, Our application right now doesn\'t support your phone language! You may get unexpected alarms if you don\'t take this action, Please contact us by mentioning what language you want. We will start work on it real soon, and you will be notified when it’s ready! For now switch to English or hold on, until we get back to you. Thanks for understanding
5% of every sales goes to poor \n children of Bangladesh!
We know you hate ads, that\'s why \n we said goodbye to it!
We can help you develop your dream project into real, with our dedicated team we are always focused on quality
By clicking \'Get Started\' if you reside in the EU, EEA or Switzerland you accept the Terms of Services and if you reside in any other country you accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Please take time to review below the key points of our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
• Providing, improving, analyzing and personalizing our services.
